::Grounded::
Grounded let out a sigh and started running after her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "Did he say that????" said Trinity while she felt the most 
important 
> bot in the universe "What're we waitting??" said the little-
> one "Follow me... I will show you the brigde"
> 
> Trinity ran towards the brigde.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded::
> > Grounded had to think quick and made something up. 
> > "Listen Aerotaur just sent me a message that he wanted you to 
take 
> on 
> > the most important job out of all of us to win this battle.
> > He needs you to help me find the ships defense controls and 
> exterior 
> > gun controls. He is trusting this job to you cause he thinks you 
> are 
> > the best one for the job."
> > He said this even though Aerotaur had not given any such 
commands. 
> I 
> > hope this works.
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Trinity::
> > > 
> > > "Please Grounded... Let me go out" begged Trinity "My pals need 
> > me..."
